column4: I have a laptop from which the screen is working partially I attached it to an external monitor, however eachtime when I touch my mousepad or keys the screen is becomming visible again how can I avoid this from happening
same problem here, the screen works good, but when I give a tick on the laptop, the computer freezes :)
paulus: also when I move the mouse around :(
the computer is doing fine here however I don't want to screen to come alive and don't know how to achieve this
